Name: Non-dominant Hand
Description: Be defeated by the player to your left

Name: Well I'm A Lefty
Description: Be defeated by the player to your right

Name: Loner
Description: Finish the game with no creatures in play

Name: Out of Options
Description: Finish the game with no cards in your hand

Name: The Little Prince
Description: Finish the game with the least lands in play

Name: Barely Played
Description: Finish the game with the least cards in your graveyard

Name: Clean Slate
Description: Finish the game with the least permanents in play

Name: Ghostly Presence
Description: Own at least 3 cards still in play after you leave the game

Name: Scorched Earth
Description: Finish the game with the least lands in play

Name: Inevitable
Description: Finish the game as the result of a state-based action (not a creature or spell)

Name: Me First!
Description: Be the first player to leave the game

Name: Kamekaze
Description: Lose the game during the same turn another player loses

Name: Seppuku
Description: Defeat yourself

Name: This is My Sword Hand
Description: Defeat the player to your right

Name: Left Jab
Description: Defeat the player to your left

Name: Creature Feature
Description: Finish the game with the most creatures in play

Name: So Much Potential
Description: Finish the game with the most cards in your hand

Name: The Most Toys
Description: Finish the game with the most artifacts in play

Name: The Most Trash
Description: Finish the game with the most cards in your graveyard

Name: Object Permanency
Description: Finish the game with the most permanents in play

Name: There Are Some Who Call Me... Tim?
Description: Finish the game with the most enchantments in play

Name: Huuuge... tracts of land
Description: Finish the game with the most lands in play

Name: Profit
Description: Finish the game with over 20 life

Name: Close Call
Description: Finish the game with 1 life

Name: Double Kill
Description: Defeat at least two other players during the same turn

Name: Kill Steal
Description: Defeat another player with the first time you deal damage to them

Name: What's Gonna Work? Teamwork!
Description: Destroy a creature with damage from multiple sources

Name: Multi-kill
Description: Destroy multiple creatures with damage from one source

Name: Bookworm
Description: Draw at least 4 cards in one turn

Name: General
Description: Attack with at least 5 creatures in one turn

Name: Spellslinger
Description: Play at least 4 spells in one turn

Name: Pronged Attack
Description: Deal damage to each other player in one turn

Name: We're Surrounded!
Description: Take damage from each other player in one round

Name: Mute
Description: Don't play any lands, spells or activate any abilities for 3 turns in a row

Name: Hot Item
Description: Have a spell or permanent you control be targeted by each other player in one turn

Name: Repetition
Description: Play the same spell at least 3 times

Name: Copycat
Description: Play the same spell as another player during the same round

Name: Let's Do That Again
Description: Copy the actions of your last turn while playing at least one spell and attacking with at least one creature

Name: It's a Setup!
Description: Control at least 5 non-land permanents from the same set

Name: Heavy Hitter
Description: Do the most damage in one turn

Name: Diversity
Description: Control the most creatures with different creature types

Name: Big Dog
Description: Control the creature with the highest power in the game

Name: Alexandria
Description: Have the most cards in your library when leaving the game

Name: Gladiator
Description: Control the creature with the most creature kills

Name: Olympic Size
Description: Have the most mana in your mana pool

Name: Immortal
Description: Have the most life

Name: Big Spender
Description: Control the permanent with the highest converted mana cost

Name: No Mercy
Description: Have the lowest amount of health before finishing the game

Name: All On the Table
Description: Have the most consecutive end-steps with 0 cards in hand

Name: Untouchable
Description: Have the most consecutive rounds without taking damage

Name: Tap Dancer
Description: Tap the most permanents in one turn

Name: Borrowing
Description: Control the highest number of permanents you don't own
